screen_desc: This screenshot shows a mobile web browser interface with the Google search bar at the top. Below the search bar, there are several pre-set tabs for different websites such as eBay, Best Buy, Amazon, and a computer store. The screen is blank, indicating that no search has been conducted yet. The browser also features icons for sharing, adding notes, and voice search.
action_think: The user wants to clear items from their cart on Best Buy. I need to navigate to Best Buy's website first before taking further actions.
action_desc: click on the Best Buy tab located at the top left of the screen.
action_result: The Best Buy tab has been clicked, but it doesn't show any items in the cart. This action helps to navigate to the Best Buy website where you can clear items from the cart.
prev_action_result: By clicking on the URL bar, we have navigated to the eBay website, which is a different destination than Best Buy. This action is not relevant to the user's request to clear items from the cart on Best Buy.
